title: Ferrari-Carano Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, October 1, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for a tasting featuring the elegant and expressive wines of Ferrari-Carano, one of Sonoma County’s most iconic wineries.

Tasting Fee: $25 (Buy a bottle from the tasting and your fee is refunded)

Featured Wines:

• Ferrari-Carano Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – 94 pts James Suckling, 91 pts Wine Enthusiast – Aromatic and full-bodied with black currant, dark chocolate, cedar, and refined structure.

• Ferrari-Carano Trésor 2021 – Bordeaux-style blend with bold notes of plum, black currant, cedar, and a lingering, textured finish.

• Ferrari-Carano Reserve Chardonnay 2022 – Rich and creamy with apple crisp, pear, peach cobbler, and graham cracker flavors over a long, indulgent finish.

Experience Ferrari-Carano’s dedication to quality and craftsmanship—buy a bottle and your tasting is free.
